languages.text: "Будьте покойны, шерин, когда встает вопрос о бытие и забвении, у Джай Хейдари — самый холодный ум и самое смелое сердце".
"Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."
languages.original_text: "Будьте покойны, шерин, когда встает вопрос о бытие и забвении, у Джай Хейдари — самый холодный ум и самое смелое сердце".

traits.locale_text: "Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."
"Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."
"Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."
"Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."

languages.text: 「安心してちょうだい、シャリーン。虚空が相手なら、ジェイ・ヘイダリは絶対に容赦しないわ」
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."

traits.locale_text: 「安心してちょうだい、シャリーン。虚空が相手なら、ジェイ・ヘイダリは絶対に容赦しないわ」

languages.text: “放心吧，亲爱的。当事关存在与湮灭时，婕伊·海达利总会有着最冷静的头脑和最勇敢的心。”
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."

traits.locale_text: “放心吧，亲爱的。当事关存在与湮灭时，婕伊·海达利总会有着最冷静的头脑和最勇敢的心。”

languages.text: "Ich versichere Euch, Shereen, wenn es um Angelegenheit des Seins und des Nichts geht, hat Jae Heydari den kältesten Verstand und das mutigste Herz."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."

traits.locale_text: "Ich versichere Euch, Shereen, wenn es um Angelegenheit des Seins und des Nichts geht, hat Jae Heydari den kältesten Verstand und das mutigste Herz."

languages.text: «Puede estar tranquil{mf|o|a}, shereen: cuando la cuestión está entre el ser y el no ser, la mente de Jae Heydari es la más fría y su corazón el más valiente».
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."

traits.locale_text: «Puede estar tranquil{mf|o|a}, shereen: cuando la cuestión está entre el ser y el no ser, la mente de Jae Heydari es la más fría y su corazón el más valiente».

languages.text: « N'ayez nulle inquiétude, shereen. Quand il est question de vie et de mort, Jae Heydari a l'esprit le plus affûté et le cœur le plus vaillant. »
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."

traits.locale_text: « N'ayez nulle inquiétude, shereen. Quand il est question de vie et de mort, Jae Heydari a l'esprit le plus affûté et le cœur le plus vaillant. »

languages.text: "İçine dert olmasın şirinim, var olmak ve yok olmak söz konusu olduğunda Jae Heydari, zihinlerin en dinginine ve kalplerin en cesuruna sahiptir."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, shereen — when it comes to matters of being and oblivion, Jae Heydari has the coldest mind and the bravest heart."
